thread.section_title: Vapornation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vapornation | vapornation.com | 2 of 90
thread.title: Nicole Lewis

author: Nicole Lewis
title: Nicole Lewis
text: To be honest I was afraid of using this company to begin with. Well I made my pick, I'll admit I could only find three reviews. They however didn't mention any problems. Made my choice, and still yet I regret it. I don't have a working vaporizer, and while offering a upgrade aka not the vaporizer I wanted. I have yet to receive it. Three weeks gone, and no resolution.
